scripts.deploy:hardhat: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network hardhat deploy --tags hardhat
scripts.deploy:kovan: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network kovan deploy --tags kovan
scripts.deploy:bsc: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network bsc deploy --tags bsc
scripts.deploy:mainnet: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat --network mainnet deploy --tags mainnet
scripts.verify:kovan: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network kovan etherscan-verify
scripts.verify:mainnet: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network mainnet etherscan-verify
scripts.verify:bsc: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat --network bsc etherscan-verify
scripts.size: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && hardhat size-contracts
